content: The only first lady to be a former soft porn model/actress…anyone can google to see her girly parts…just who i plan to NOT let my children research or look up too…pretty bad I can’t have the TV on unless its Netflix for the next few years the news has become nothing but Trumps lies, corruption and hatred all the time…minus his address to congress had his wife not looked like she was going to a cocktail party and his daughter looking like she was going out clubbing I would have a totally positive opinion of that address as it was presented even though I do not agree with most of what Trump is pushing as his agenda…I hope he finds some compassion for the people he wants to just toss out..and I don’t mean criminals but dreamers or children or the ones who never intended to come here and stay but via circumstance did and are now stuck..they cant safely leave, they cant safely stay and they have no way become legal
